xml.data:
Home » 37P1 Dhammānuloma (1), Tikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (1) » 21 Ajjhattattika » 21.3 Paccayavāra » 21.3.1 Paccayānuloma » 21.3.1.1 Vibhaṅgavāra
Hetu
Ajjhattattika
Paccayavāra
Paccayānuloma
Vibhaṅgavāra
Hetu
18.
2794Ajjhattaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā ajjhatto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—  ajjhattaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paccayā tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ…pe…  dve khandhe…pe…  paṭisandhikkhaṇe (paripuṇṇaṃ). Ekaṃ mahābhūtaṃ…pe…  vatthuṃ paccayā ajjhattā khandhā. (1)
2795Bahiddhā dhammaṃ paccayā bahiddhā dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—  bahiddhā ekaṃ khandhaṃ paccayā tayo khandhā…pe…  paṭisandhikkhaṇe…pe…  ekaṃ mahābhūtaṃ…pe…  vatthuṃ paccayā bahiddhā khandhā. (1)
<< 21.3.1.1 Vibhaṅgavāraup Ārammaṇa >>
